_header: Can ye dance the shaking of the sheets
_description: The dance of death — 11 seven-line stanzas

BLAdd15225.First Lines:
Canne yea dance the shakinge of the sheetesA And daunce
                    that everie man must dooe…
BLAdd15225.Last Lines:
…That when my minstrell pypes his playYea may to heauen daunce
                    readie way
BLAdd15225.Attributed Title:
A dolfull daunce & song of death intituled the shakeing of the sheetes
                    (f. 15)
BLAdd15225.Editions:
Gray,  Douglas. 
             “Two Songs of Death.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         64 (1963): 354-64: 64-7.
